metadata.title: CVE-2010-2445 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
freeciv 2.2 before 2.2.1 and 2.3 before 2.3.0 allows attackers to readarbitrary files or execute arbitrary commands via a scenario that containsLua functionality, related to the (1) os, (2) io, (3) package, (4) dofile,(5) loadfile, (6) loadlib, (7) module, and (8) require modules orfunctions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-2445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freeciv - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-extras - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-gtk - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-gtk3 - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-qt - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-client-sdl - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-data - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-server - 2.4.2-1
freeciv-sound-standard - 2.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeciv package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-1').
